item.title: 企业内部人士买入跌势中的美股
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 06:21。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 06:21 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: 德拉吉称欧洲需要区域性国防指挥系统
item.description: 意大利前总理马里奥-德拉吉（Mario Draghi）表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的外交政策议程出台后，欧洲需要整合其武装力量并建立地区指挥结构。【原文：Europe needs to integrate its armed forces and develop a regional command structure in the wake of US President Donald Trump’s foreign policy agenda, former Italian premier Mario Draghi said.】

item.title: 英特尔新任首席执行官在 220 亿美元大涨后面临 "向我展示 "的时刻
item.description: 自上周英特尔公司宣布陈立武将接任首席执行官以来，公司股价一路飙升。现在，陈立武上任后，如何实现人们对他的殷切希望还很不明确。【原文：Since Intel Corp. announced that Lip-Bu Tan would take over as CEO last week, the company’s shares have soared. Now, as Tan assumes his job, it is far from clear how he will fulfill the big hopes that have been placed on his shoulders.】

item.title: 印尼财政部长英德拉瓦蒂表示不会辞职
item.description: 印度尼西亚资深财政部长斯里-穆利亚尼-英德拉瓦蒂（Sri Mulyani Indrawati）表示，她将继续留任财政部长一职，消除了导致股市创下三年来最大跌幅的辞职传言。【原文：Indonesia’s veteran Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati said she will stay in her post, dispelling resignation rumors that helped drive the stock market to its biggest slump in three years.】

item.title: 德国投资者展望跃升至 2022 年以来最高水平
item.description: 随着德国准备在新政府领导下进行数千亿欧元的基础设施和军事投资，投资者对德国经济的信心达到两年多来的最高点。【原文：Investor confidence in Germany’s economy soared by the most in more than two years as the country prepares for hundreds of billions of euros of infrastructure and military investments under its new government.】

item.title: 瑞士财政部长称瑞银游说活动吵闹但无用
item.description: 瑞士财政部长卡琳-凯勒-萨特（Karin Keller-Sutter）表示，瑞士政府不会被瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）反对对瑞士最大银行实施更严格资本要求的游说活动所左右。【原文：Switzerland’s government won’t be swayed by UBS Group AG’s lobby campaign against stricter capital requirements for the nation’s biggest bank, according to Finance Minister Karin Keller-Sutter.】

item.title: General Atlantic、Lead Edge 以 12 亿美元估值押注 Nerdio
item.description: Nerdio 是一家软件公司，致力于让 IT 专业人士更轻松地管理远程工作。【原文：General Atlantic has agreed to lead a $500 million equity round in Nerdio, a software company that seeks to make remote work easier to manage for IT professionals.】

item.title: 酿酒银行家 Jordaan 考虑联手发展零钱银行
item.description: 南非最大的消费贷款公司之一的前总裁迈克尔-乔尔丹（Michael Jordaan）正在考虑与零号银行（Bank Zero）合作发展，因为这家应用驱动型公司正试图挑战南非最大的金融机构。【原文：Michael Jordaan, the former chief of one of South Africa’s biggest consumer lenders, is considering partnerships to grow Bank Zero as the app-driven firm seeks to challenge the country’s biggest finance institutions.】

item.title: 法国监管机构准备让权以推进欧洲市场发展
item.description: 法国最高金融监管机构表示，她愿意将部分权力移交给欧盟监管机构，以帮助该地区发展声名狼藉的分散资本市场。【原文：A top French financial watchdog said she’s willing to transfer some powers to a European Union regulator to help develop the region’s notoriously fragmented capital markets.】

item.title: 公司内部人士大举买入为 S&P 多头带来信心
item.description: 美股多头们正在寻找市场最糟糕的衰退期已经过去的迹象，他们把目光投向了一群知情的投资者：公司高管。【原文：US stock bulls searching for signs that the worst of the market rout is over are looking to one group of in-the-know investors: company executives.】

item.title: DVD 租赁成本将不再是英国通货膨胀计算的一部分
item.description: 虚拟现实头盔将被添加到用于衡量英国通货膨胀的产品清单中，而当地报纸广告和 DVD 租赁也已出炉，显示出技术如何改变了购物习惯。【原文：Virtual reality headsets will be added to a list of products used to measure inflation in Britain, while local newspaper adverts and DVD rentals are out, showing how technology has changed shopping habits.】

item.title: 雷恩称欧洲央行在不确定性中保持充分行动自由
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，随着地缘政治变化对全球经济造成的压力，欧洲中央银行将保持开放的态度。【原文：The European Central Bank is keeping its options open as geopolitical shifts weigh on the global economy, according to Governing Council member Olli Rehn.】

item.title: 被控将支付公司变成赌博中心的土耳其银行家被捕
item.description: 土耳其当局在全面打击非法在线博彩的行动中查封了 BankPozitif 精品银行，并逮捕了包括 BankPozitif 主席埃尔坎-科克（Erkan Kork）在内的数十名嫌疑人。【原文：Turkish authorities arrested dozens of suspects, including BankPozitif chairman Erkan Kork, after seizing the boutique bank in a sweeping crackdown on illegal online betting.】

item.title: 迪迪在 "关门 "后的零星复苏中重回红灯区
item.description: 滴滴全球公司（Didi Global Inc.【原文：Didi Global Inc. swung back to a quarterly loss, a blow to the Chinese ride-hailing leader exploring a Hong Kong listing this year.】

item.title: 道达尔的法国液化天然气终端在天然气需求旺盛的情况下仍处于闲置状态
item.description: 由于运营成本过高，法国最新的液化天然气码头被迫闲置，错过了今年冬天的高燃料价格。【原文：France’s newest liquefied natural gas terminal missed out on high fuel prices this winter as prohibitive operational costs have forced it to lie idle.】

item.title: 维托尔聘用 SEFE 金属部主管 de Sousa 来加强铜业团队
item.description: 随着能源贸易巨头继续努力拓展金属业务，Vitol 集团聘请了德国国有能源公司 SEFE 的基本金属交易主管加入其铜矿团队。【原文：Vitol Group has hired the head of base metals trading at German state-owned energy firm SEFE to join its copper team as the energy trading giant continues efforts to expand into the metals business.】

item.title: 印度部长表示印度需要卫星互联网，以推动马斯克的发展
item.description: 印度电信部长表示，印度需要卫星互联网，尤其是在农村地区，这对希望在世界上人口最多的国家开展业务的埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链公司（Starlink Inc.【原文：India needs satellite internet especially in its rural areas, its telecom minister said, a positive regulatory sign for Elon Musk’s Starlink Inc. which has aspirations to operate in the world’s most-populous nation.】

item.title: Aviva 首席执行官称，英国养老金在国内投资 5%还不够
item.description: Aviva Plc 首席执行官阿曼达-布兰克（Amanda Blanc）认为，英国养老基金应将 5%以上的资产投资于国内，因为政府对管理者施加了压力，要求他们更多地投资于国内。【原文：UK pension funds should invest more than 5% of their assets at home, according to Amanda Blanc, chief executive officer Aviva Plc, as the government piles pressure on managers to commit more to domestic investments.】

item.title: 小米将 2025 年电动汽车交付目标提高到 35 万辆
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）将全年电动汽车交付目标提高到 35 万辆，因为该公司正涉足这一新兴领域以推动增长。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. raised its full-year delivery target of electric vehicles to 350,000 units as the company is venturing into the nascent field to drive growth.】

item.title: 美国无人机制造商 Skydio 希望从中国手中夺回美国领空
item.description:
对国家安全的担忧可能会帮助这家初创公司蚕食该行业的全球领先地位。【原文：

National security concerns could help the startup chip away at the industry’s global leader.

】

item.title: 华尔街区块链大佬呼吁在 2025 年制定新规则并提供专业知识
item.description:
数字资产领域的领导者讨论了加快传统金融业采用数字资产所需的条件

。【原文：

Digital asset leaders discuss what is needed to speed up adoption in traditional finance

】

item.title: 沙普尔吉获得印度最大私人债务交易的约束性投标
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，一批私人信贷基金已经向印度 Shapoorji Pallonji 集团做出了具有约束力的承诺，该集团正在筹集多达 33 亿美元的资金，这可能是印度最大的私人信贷交易。【原文：A group of private credit funds has given binding commitments to India’s Shapoorji Pallonji Group, which is raising as much as $3.3 billion in what could be the country’s biggest private credit deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国银行调查显示美国股票投资有史以来最大降幅
item.description: 根据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的数据，由于对全球经济增长的预期恶化，最近几周投资者对美国股票投资的减持幅度创下历史之最。【原文：Investors slashed exposure to US equities by the most on record in recent weeks as expectations of global economic growth worsened, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 先锋报》称尼日利亚尼日尔河输油管道发生爆炸
item.description: 据《先锋报》（Vanguard）报道，为邦尼出口终端输油的跨尼日利亚输油管道发生爆炸，但未引述任何人的消息。【原文：An explosion rocked the Trans-Nigeria Pipeline that feeds the Bonny export terminal, Vanguard reported, without citing anyone.】

item.title: 华尔街公司投身欧洲蓬勃发展的主动型 ETF 市场
item.description: 美国投资公司正急于抢占欧洲主动型交易所交易基金市场的更大份额，预计未来几年该行业的资产规模将增至 1 万亿美元。【原文：US investment firms are rushing to grab a greater chunk of Europe’s market for active exchange-traded funds, an industry projected to grow to $1 trillion in assets over the coming years.】

item.title: 押注英国利率将继续走高，英镑升至 1.30 美元
item.description: 英镑自 11 月以来首次升至 1.30 美元以上，因为人们押注英国今年的利率将保持在主要同类国家之上。【原文：The pound rose above $1.30 for the first time since November on bets interest rates in the UK will stay above those of its main peers this year.】

item.title: 韩国央行成员更加关注巩固经济势头
item.description: 根据上个月的会议记录，韩国央行董事会成员表示，韩国经济面临一系列风险，包括唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税、消费低迷和出口势头减弱，韩国央行需要集中精力支撑经济。【原文：The Bank of Korea needs to focus on shoring up an economy that faces a range of risks including Donald Trump’s tariffs, a consumption slump and weakening export momentum, board members said, according to minutes of their meeting last month.】

item.title: 瑞士法郎期权活动激增，交易者押注更多损失
item.description: 在瑞士法郎期权历史上最繁忙的一天，交易员们大举押注瑞士法郎将扩大近期跌幅。【原文：In one of the busiest days in history for Swiss franc options, traders bet big that the currency will extend its recent losses.】

item.title: 德国债券在释放国防开支投票前下跌
item.description: 在德国议会就一项历史性的支出方案进行投票之前，德国债券下跌，该方案将为欧洲最大的经济体在国防和基础设施方面支出数千亿欧元敞开大门。【原文：German bonds fell ahead of the nation’s parliamentary vote on a historic spending package that will open the door for Europe’s largest economy to spend hundreds of billions of euros in defense and infrastructure.】

item.title: 泛欧交易所认为资金在美国反思消费问题之际流向欧洲
item.description: 泛欧交易所（Euronext NV）首席执行官Stephane Boujnah表示，在政府支出增加的前景下，以及在投资者重新评估美国市场的情况下，越来越多的投资者将资金转移到欧洲。【原文：Euronext NV Chief Executive Officer Stephane Boujnah said investors are increasingly moving money to Europe amid prospects for higher government spending and as investors reevaluate the US markets.】
